attributes.action: create law which will make mandatory deportation of ALL criminals with dual nationality to country of origin when their sentence is greather equal 10 years in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
create law which will make mandatory deportation of ALL criminals with dual nationality to country of origin when their sentence is greather equal 10 years in prison.
Moreover, this should include removal of British citizenship removal right to return to the UK for at least 150% of the original cour sentence!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
